name: Vitale #2
description: Your 2.13 carat emerald cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS1 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with a rare white F colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by a precise cut. Its The step-cut faceting style of the emerald cut creates a hall-of-mirrors effect, producing flashes of light and emphasising the clarity of your diamond. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
